```
% cat peerdas-super-plus-fulu.yaml 
participants:
  - el_type: geth
    cl_type: teku
    cl_extra_params: [
        --p2p-subscribe-all-custody-subnets-enabled

    cl_min_mem: 2000
  - el_type: geth
    cl_type: teku
    cl_image: consensys/teku:develop
    cl_min_cpu: 2000
    cl_min_mem: 2000

  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  fulu_fork_epoch: 2
#snooper_enabled: true
global_log_level: info
additional_services:
  - dora
  - goomy_blob
  - prometheus_grafana
#  - blob_spammer
dora_params:
  image: ethpandaops/dora:fulu-support

```
